info.name: Kanban-board-backend
info.description:
This Collection contains the apis of Kanban-board-app

[https://github.com/Ruchikadeol/kanban-board-zidio](https://github.com/Ruchikadeol/kanban-board-zidio.git)

request.description:
This will return the user details with the access token and will also set the token in cookie.

Use the token to access board routes. in request authorization header

It will also set the authorization cookie in the browser
It will remove the authorization cookie from the browser.

header.value: Authorization=j%3A%5B%22%22%5D; Max-Age=0; Path=/; Expires=Sat, 28 Oct 2023 07:15:31 GMT

request.description: After updation check all tasks of user to get updated tasks
